title: Braised Celery With Crunchy Bread Crumb Topping
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Braised Celery With Crunchy Bread Crumb Topping a try. This recipe serves 4. One serving contains 205 calories, 5g of protein, and 13g of fat. For $1.35 per serving, this recipe covers 10% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Head to the store and pick up shallot, chicken stock, bread crumbs made from day-old rustic bread, and a few other things to make it today. Only a few people made this recipe, and 9 would say it hit the spot. It is a good option if you're following a vegetarian diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 1 hour and 30 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 40%. This score is solid. Try Broccoli With A Crunchy Crumb Topping, Triple Berry Pie with Granola Crunchy Crumb Topping, and Banana Bread Muffins with Crumb Topping for similar recipes.
